name: SurplexMachineSounds
0:
”Alexa, open machine sound box”
”Alexa, launch machine sound box”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: machine sound box
des: Experience the ambiance of a workshop from anywhere with our Alexa app. Choose between authentic sounds from woodworking and metalworking machines to transform your home or workplace into a vibrant workshop. Whether you're looking to focus, relax, or simply enjoy the unique sounds of craftsmanship, our app offers a carefully curated selection of high-quality audio recordings. Activate the sounds with simple voice commands and customize your listening experience to create an inspiring and productive environment. Ideal for craftsmen, artists, and anyone who loves the rustic and industrial atmosphere.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
